sect2.title: Installation of Gettext
sect2.para: This package has a test suite available which can perform a number of checks to ensure it built correctly. However, the Gettext test suite here in Chapter 5 is known to cause problems if for instance it finds a Java compiler on the host. It also takes a very long time to run and is considered not critical to the success of the overall build. We therefore recommend not to run it here.
